card.name: The Scarab God
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses X life and you scry X, where X is the number of Zombies you control. {2}{U}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie. When The Scarab God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: The Locust God
card.text: Flying Whenever you draw a card, create a 1/1 blue and red Insect creature token with flying and haste. {2}{U}{R}: Draw a card, then discard a card. When The Locust God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Thoughtseize
card.text: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

card.name: Armageddon
card.text: Destroy all lands.

card.name: Threads of Disloyalty
card.text: Enchant creature with converted mana cost 2 or less You control enchanted creature.

card.name: Omniscience
card.text: You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Doomsday
card.text: Search your library and graveyard for five cards and exile the rest. Put the chosen cards on top of your library in any order. You lose half your life, rounded up.

card.name: Boil
card.text: Destroy all Islands.

card.name: Through the Breach
card.text: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step. Splice onto Arcane {2}{R}{R} As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Sunder
card.text: Return all lands to their owners' hands.

card.name: Diabolic Edict
card.text: Target player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: The Scorpion God
card.text: Whenever a creature with a -1/-1 counter on it dies, draw a card. {1}{B}{R}: Put a -1/-1 counter on another target creature. When The Scorpion God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Forbid
card.text: Buyback—Discard two cards. You may discard two cards in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Counter target spell.

card.name: Slaughter Pact
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {2}{B}. If you don't, you lose the game.

card.name: Choke
card.text: Islands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

card.name: Avatar of Woe
card.text: If there are ten or more creature cards total in all graveyards, Avatar of Woe costs {6} less to cast. Fear This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) {T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Shatterstorm
card.text: Destroy all artifacts. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Lord of Extinction
card.text: Lord of Extinction's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in all graveyards.

card.name: Opposition
card.text: Tap an untapped creature you control: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

card.name: No Mercy
card.text: Whenever a creature deals damage to you, destroy it.

card.name: Capsize
card.text: Buyback {3} You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Desolation Angel
card.text: Kicker {W}{W} You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you cast this spell.) Flying When Desolation Angel enters the battlefield, destroy all lands you control. If it was kicked, destroy all lands instead.

card.name: Blood Moon
card.text: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.

card.name: Damnation
card.text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Rhonas the Indomitable
card.text: Deathtouch, indestructible Rhonas the Indomitable can't attack or block unless you control another creature with power 4 or greater. {2}{G}: Another target creature gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Bontu the Glorified
card.text: Menace, indestructible Bontu the Glorified can't attack or block unless a creature died under your control this turn. {1}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Scry 1. Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Oketra the True
card.text: Double strike, indestructible Oketra the True can't attack or block unless you control at least three other creatures. {3}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token with vigilance.

card.name: Kefnet the Mindful
card.text: Flying, indestructible Kefnet the Mindful can't attack or block unless you have seven or more cards in hand. {3}{U}: Draw a card, then you may return a land you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Hazoret the Fervent
card.text: Indestructible, haste Hazoret the Fervent can't attack or block unless you have one or fewer cards in hand. {2}{R}, Discard a card: Hazoret deals 2 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Divert
card.text: Change the target of target spell with a single target unless that spell's controller pays {2}.

card.name: Entomb
card.text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your graveyard. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Diabolic Intent
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Diabolic Intent, sacrifice a creature. Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Attrition
card.text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target nonblack creature.

card.name: Aggravated Assault
card.text: {3}{R}{R}: Untap all creatures you control. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Stifle
card.text: Counter target activated or triggered ability. Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

card.name: Spell Pierce
card.text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.

card.name: Containment Priest
card.text: Flash If a nontoken creature would enter the battlefield and it wasn't cast, exile it instead.

card.name: Austere Command
card.text: Choose two — • Destroy all artifacts. • Destroy all enchantments. • Destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 3 or less. • Destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 4 or greater.

card.name: Daze
card.text: You may return an Island you control to its owner's hand rather than pay Daze's mana cost. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

card.name: Loyal Retainers
card.text: Sacrifice Loyal Retainers: Return target legendary creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Dark Ritual
card.text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Vindicate
card.text: Destroy target permanent.

card.name: Force of Will
card.text: You may pay 1 life and exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay Force of Will's mana cost. Counter target spell.

card.name: Mind Twist
card.text: Target player discards X cards at random.

card.name: Worship
card.text: If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

card.name: Cryptic Command
card.text: Choose two — • Counter target spell. • Return target permanent to its owner's hand. • Tap all creatures your opponents control. • Draw a card.

card.name: Counterbalance
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may reveal the top card of your library. If you do, counter that spell if it has the same converted mana cost as the revealed card.

card.name: Counterspell
card.text: Counter target spell.

card.name: Wrath of God
card.text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Pact of Negation
card.text: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {3}{U}{U}. If you don't, you lose the game.

card.name: Consecrated Sphinx
card.text: Flying Whenever an opponent draws a card, you may draw two cards.

card.name: Maelstrom Pulse
card.text: Destroy target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent.

card.name: Aven Mindcensor
card.text: Flash Flying If an opponent would search a library, that player searches the top four cards of that library instead.

card.name: Chain Lightning
card.text: Chain Lightning deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Then that player or that creature's controller may pay {R}{R}. If the player does, he or she may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.
